short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GigNotify sends you timely notifications for new job postings across major freelancing platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GigNotify is designed to help freelancers stay up-to-date with new job opportunities listed on popular freelancing platforms. With this extension, users can receive real-time notifications whenever a new job matching their preferences is posted on platforms like Upwork, etc.
